page.title: 04Leisure Time, Evesham.
page.content: Daniel's favourite{hobby}is collecting farm{models.}"I have a lot of farm toys I get a lot of fun from it.I'm collecting the roadmen as well with all the machines,they have compressors and concreting lorries.Another hobby is{running}and I can go quite fast but I want to get faster.My other hobby is {playing marbles." }**************** Karen collects"foreign costume{dolls. I have two from Spain and one indian, two from Ireland and three from Sweden.I have collected fifty{shells } from the seaside.I also collect different-shaped{money boxes.}My brother collects{coins.}My mum's hobby is{sewing.}She has made me some dolls. My mum's favourite hobby is{TALKING !}
